title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 201.2 - Macy's bank
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 201.2 - Macy's bank

State Regulations

The Banking Board hereby suspends section 20.1 (prohibiting
the payment of interest on demand deposits) of Part 20 of this Title insofar as
it applies to Macy's Bank. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
201.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
